name: nxt-api
description: API request wrapper for NXT crypto for Node.js and the browser. It just has all the currently public API methods for NXT along side with a dual API Promise/Callback based interface. Plus it's created using Typescript, which should ensure the proper parameters for each API call.

scripts.browser: browserify nxt-api.js --noparse request --noparse bluebird --ignore request --standalone NXT > dist/nxt-api.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run compile && node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.npm: npm run test && npm run browser && npm publish
